bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4639-4704. - I. New Literary Texts (4639-4652). - II. Known Literary Texts (4653-4668). - III. Subliterary Texts (4669-4674). - IV. Documentary Texts (4675-4704).
bibl.seg: GONIS N., D. OBBINK and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by H. AMIRAV, C.F.L. AUSTIN, L. CAPPONI, D. COLOMO, B. CURRIE, K. DOULAMIS, E.W. HANDLEY, A. KERKHECKER, H. MAEHLER, F. London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2003, 8°, xii-184 pp. et XVI pll. coul. ISBN 0-85698-142-7. £65.
